descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=5]TRADUCTION FRANCAISE DE "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52296/]UNIQUE BORDER GATES[/url]"[/size][/b][/center]
[b][size=4]A PROPOS DE "UNIQUE BORDER GATES"[/size][/b]
[size=2]Unique Border Gates redesigns the border crossings of Cyrodill, Hammerfell and Morrowind by adding new, unique and immersive gates. No two are alike and I believe the design reflects the area well. Each location is discoverable and you can fast travel after discovery.

The following are brief and spoiler-free descriptions of each gate.

[/size][list][*][b][size=2]Dunmeth Pass Gate[/size][/b][/*]
[size=2]Located in northeastern Eastmarch Hold along the northern road leading into Morrowind, this gate is of Imperial design. It has recently experienced a destructive battle during the Civil War.[/size][/list]
[list][*][b][size=2]Pale Pass Gate[/size][/b][/*]
[size=2]Located in southeastern Falkreath Hold along the road leading into Cyrodiil, this gate is all that remains of an old ruined fortress of Whiterun design. Imperial soldiers have fortified the gate to protect the Pale Pass.[/size][/list]
[list][*][b][size=2]Silgrad Pass Gate[/size][/b][/*]
[size=2]Located in eastern Riften Hold along the southern road leading into Morrowind, this gate is of Riften design. Last anyone knew Riften soldiers were guarding it against bandits and smugglers.[/size][/list]
[list][*][b][size=2]Talos Pass Gate[/size][/b][/*]
[size=2]Located in southwestern Falkreath Hold along the road leading into Hammerfell, this gate is of ancient Nord design. It features massive stone structures and an impenetrable iron gate.  It is so named in dedication to Talos, who is said to have spent time in the region, with a statue frequented by adventurers heading west.[/size][/list]
[list][*][b][size=2]Druadach Pass Gate (Town of Cliffstone)[/size][/b][/*]
[size=2]Incomplete WIP. Located in western Haafingar Hold along the road leading into High Rock, this gate is of Dwemer design. Once an ancient tunnel through the Druadach Mountains, Thalmor agents destroyed it to hinder the rebellion. I will not be able to complete this mod due to full-time employment and a new baby. Sorry.[/size][/list]
[b][size=4]PREREQUIS[/size][/b]
[size=2]Skyrim est le seul prérequis. Fonction avec ou sans les DLCs.[/size]

[size=2]While my mod will work as-is, you will be unable to have full access to its content if the invisible border Bethesda placed around Skyrim is not turned off. In order to do so please add, or ensure, the following is in your Skyrim.ini file:[/size]

[size=2][General][/size]
[size=2]bBorderRegionsEnabled=0[/size]

[b][size=4]INSTALLATION[/size][/b]
[size=2]The Main Section under Files contain the All-In-One version of Unique Border Gates and its compatibility patches. So if you want to use all gates with Point The Way, your load order would be:[/size]
[list][*][size=2]Point The Way.esp[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]UniqueBorderGates-All.esp[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]UniqueBorderGates-All-PointTheWay.esp[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]The Optional Section under Files contains the various standalone versions. You should NOT use these if you're using the All version, and only use one version per gate. Load order shouldn't matter, but the ones requiring another mod need to be loaded after that mod.When updating or switching to a different version, I recommend saving your game someplace far away from any of the gates before updating. This should help avoid any unsightly errors when you install the new version.[/size]

[b][size=4]COMPATIBILITE[/size][/b]
[size=2]Les mods éditant les mêmes zones que "Unique Border Gates" ne sont pas compatibles. [/size]
[size=2]"Unique Border Gates" est compatible avec :[/size]
[list][*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30086/]More Immersive Dawnguard Entrance[/url] - Adjusted landscape, fixed floating plants, re-enabled trees and added a road piece.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33393/]Point The Way[/url] - Moved the signpost to avoid clipping and replaced the signpost with snow-covered variants for immersion.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33164/]The Cyrodiil Frontier - Fight Against the Thalmor II[/url] - Removed the Imperial camp from my mod so it only has my unique gate and ruins.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35789/]Shadow of Morrowind[/url] - Moved the auto-load door so it won't be activated until after passing thru my gate.[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]"Unique Border Gates" n'est PAS compatible avec ces mods :[/size][list][*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44278/]Closed and Guarded Border Gates[/url] - Conflicts with ALL.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18106/]Guarded Borders[/url] - Conflicts with Pale Pass Gate, Silgrad Pass Gate and Talos Pass Gate[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38856/]Hammerfell Border House[/url] - Conflicts with Talos Pass Gate.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18832/]Morrowind Border Guards[/url] - Conflicts with Silgrad Pass Gate.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41175/]Open Border Riften to Morrowind[/url] - Conflicts with Silgrad Pass Gate.[/size][/*]
[/list][b]
[size=4]INFOS TECHNIQUES[/size][/b][list][*][size=2]Vanilla navmesh has been untouched.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Vanilla gates and other objects have been disabled, not deleted.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Mod has been cleaned with TES5Edit.[/size][/*]
[/list][b]
[size=4]CREDITS & REMERCIEMENTS[/size][/b][list][*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/][size=2]TES5Edit[/size][/url][/*]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49373/][size=2]Automation Tools for TES5Edit[/size][/url][/*]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37981/][size=2]Merge Plugins TES5Edit Script[/size][/url][/*]
[/list]
author: Aryksa
